meanings: (하고 싶다) (동사로 쓰여) want (to), would like to, wish (to), (formal) desire (to), feel like (doing)
(~한 생각이 들다) (동사로 쓰여) look, seem, appear
감사 I would like to thank you.
감사 I would like to express my thanks.
감사 I want to express my appreciation.
만남 I missed you so much.
만남 I really wanted to see you.
만남 I was hoping to see you again.
실용회화-오랜만에 만났을 때 I missed you.

vlive.korean: 이거 하고 싶었어 하고 싶었어! I wanted to do this! I wanted to do this! 듣기 View video TREASURE (트레저) : TREASURE - [T.M.I] EP.4
